tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE text_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    text_content TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE table1 (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    text_data TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE table2 (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sentence TEXT,
    token_count INT
)

CREATE TABLE table3 (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    document_id INT,
    word_count INT
)

CREATE TABLE table4 (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    document_id INT,
    word TEXT
)
CREATE TABLE TextData (id INT PRIMARY KEY, text_data TEXT);
CREATE TABLE Sentences (id INT PRIMARY KEY, sentence TEXT);
CREATE TABLE Words (id INT PRIMARY KEY, word TEXT);
CREATE TABLE TextAnalysis (id INT PRIMARY KEY, text_id INT, sentence_id INT, word_id INT, analysis_result TEXT);
CREATE TABLE AnalysisMetadata (id INT PRIMARY KEY, analysis_id INT, metadata_key TEXT, metadata_value TEXT);
